embed.description: Good news everyone - Server maintenance for our next patch, Patch 5.13, has been scheduled! On July 8th at 3:00 PDT for NA,5:00 UK Time for EUW, and 3:00 CEST for EUNE, servers will go down for maintenance and the 5.13 patch will be applied.Here's NA version of the Network Operations maintenance announcement: "On 07/08/15, starting at, 01:30 Pacific time (08:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.13.

replies.body: now this is just stupid, it's a fucking official riot post, found on the riot website already.
yes it is, but the Patch-notes are not yet known, this is a list of said details.
